original_text: And Ahaz gathered together the vessels of the house of God, and cut in pieces the vessels of the house of God, and shut up the doors of the house of the Lord, and he made him altars in every corner of Jerusalem.
korean_text: 아하스가 하나님의 전의 기구들을 모아 하나님의 전의 기구들을 부수고 또 여호와의 전 문들을 닫고 예루살렘 구석마다 제단을 쌓고

sentences.original_text: And Ahaz gathered together the vessels of house of God
and cut in pieces the vessels of house of God
and shut up the doors of house of the Lord
